titles.title: Main criteria of risk acceptability in operation of NPP units

record.abstract: NPP units’ safety is priority of their operation. Estimation of NPP unit safety level’s acceptability is currently performed through comparison of probabilistic safety and target means determined in normative documents. But Russian normative documents do not contain explanation of target probabilistic safety indexes value. Authors of this paper analyze existing values of probabilistic safety indexes in Russia and find those values lying within margins of general worldwide-used methods of risk analysis. Moreover, the paper shows the evidence that NPP unit operation risks and other kinds of human activity risks are comparable.
